name: Conditional Execution
description: This block conditionally triggers the execution of specified workflow blocks via the Workflow API, running them only when the Conditional Parameter is set to true.
introductoryText:
# Conditional Workflow Executor Block

This block empowers users to dynamically control workflow execution based on a simple boolean condition. 
Instead of relying on methods like the Validate block — which can cause the entire workflow to fail — it simply checks a boolean option, that you can link it to a Project Parameter. 
When the option/parameter is set to true, it executes a designated list of workflow blocks via the Workflow API.

This approach is ideal for scenarios where:
- **Conditional Execution:** Only specific segments of a workflow need to be run based on dynamic conditions.
- **Robust Workflow Management:** Avoid potential workflow failures by bypassing validation errors.
- **Dynamic Control:** Link the execution flag to a project parameter, allowing for flexible, real-time control over workflow processes.

By integrating this block into your workflow, you can fine-tune execution paths, ensuring that only the necessary components run, which enhances overall process efficiency and reliability.
